title: Pearhead Baby Shower Guest Book, Gender Neutral, Classic Neutral Guest Book for Weddings and Events, 100 Blank Pages, 7" x 9", Ivory Linen with Gold Print
description: It's baby shower time! Cherish the memories, moments, and guests attending your baby shower with Pearhead guest book. This elegant, linen guest book includes 100 blank pages for all your guests to sign and give their well wishes. Whether you are welcoming a baby girl, boy, or keeping it a surprise, this guest book is the perfect way to remember your guests from the shower. Everyone can take their own page and write their advice, well wishes, and loving messages. After your shower, you will love flipping through the guest book and reading everyone's Sweet messages. This guest book is the cutest and most memorable way to cherish your little bundle of joy's baby shower. Years later when your little baby is all grown up, they can even look through the book and see who attended the shower! The cream linen color with "guest book" Debossed in the front in gold foil, makes this an elegant keepsake to store on any bookshelf or in your baby's nursery. Use the included satin ribbon to bookmark specific pages and easily flip to that page later. And don't forget to fill in who this book belongs to on the first inside page. Forever cherish your baby's shower and all the loving family and friends attending with Pearhead guest book. Product dimensions: 8.8" W x 7" H x .47" D.
